attributes.action: Look at Minimum wage, and pay an 18yo the same as a 21yo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request that the government look at minimum wage, it is not fair that someone ages 21 can be paid more than someone ages 18 who is doing exactly the same job, the same work. How is this fair? It is discrimination and shows how society isn't totally equal.
